## TExpandState type

A utility tpye to specify the intial state of an expandable table.

Supported states: - 'undefined' to render the table immediately using a generic dataview table; - 'true' to render the table immediately and expand the table by default; - 'false' to collapse the table by default and render the table on-demand.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare type TExpandState = boolean | undefined;
```
